# serverTrust

**Instance Property**

The trust management object you use to evaluate trust for the current webpage.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var serverTrust: SecTrust? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the object in this property to validate the webpage’s certificate and associated credentials. [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] is key-value observing (KVO) compliant for this property.

## Inspecting the view information

- **scrollView**: The scroll view associated with the web view.
- **title**: The page title.
- **url**: The URL for the current webpage.
- **mediaType**: The media type for the contents of the web view.
- **customUserAgent**: The custom user agent string.
- **hasOnlySecureContent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the web view loaded all resources on the page through securely encrypted connections.
- **themeColor**: The theme color that the system gets from the first valid meta tag in the webpage.
- **underPageBackgroundColor**: The color the web view displays behind the active page, visible when the user scrolls beyond the bounds of the page.
